mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (room_title, room_count, user_email, user_nickname, room_secret, room_pwd) values (#{room_title}, #{room_count}, #{user_email}, #{user_nickname}, #{room_secret} , #{room_pwd})
mapper.select: select c.room_number, c.room_title, c.user_email, c.room_secret, c.room_pwd, c.room_count, u.uimg, u.nick, (SELECT COUNT(user_email) FROM chatmember WHERE room_number = c.room_number) AS current_count from chatroom c JOIN user u ON c.user_email = u.userid
select c.room_number, c.room_title, c.user_email, c.room_secret, c.room_pwd, c.room_count, u.nick from chatroom c JOIN user u ON c.user_email = u.userid where c.room_number=#{room_number}
select room_pwd from chatroom where room_number=#{room_number}
mapper.insert: insert into chatmember (mem_number, room_number, user_email) values ((select ifnull(max(mem_number),0) from chatmember c)+1 ,#{param1}, #{param2});
mapper.select: SELECT count(user_email) FROM chatmember WHERE room_number = #{room_number}
SELECT u.nick from user u Join chatmember c ON u.userid = c.user_email where c.room_number = #{room_number}
mapper.delete: delete from chatmember where user_email = #{param1} and room_number = #{param2}
mapper.select: select count(*) from chatmember where room_number = #{param1} and user_email = #{param2}
